Posts.EditableText:
Hello I am getting an error when trying to edit a Quest game using the online Quest Engine. I am using Google Chrome - 24 under Linux (Linux Mint) and I am getting this error:

Failed to load game

Failed to load game due to the following errors:
* Invalid XML: An error occurred while parsing EntityName. Line 6, position 23.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank You 
InsertCoin25

Posts.EditableText:
something is wrong with your game code, open it in a wordpad, and fix the mistake in the code:

[code:2zzzmdt2]line 1
line 2
line 3
line 4
line 5
line 6...............23[/code:2zzzmdt2]

for me, usually my xml (or whatever) errors are due to a missing " > " at the end of a line, lol

Posts.EditableText:
I got to the title of the game and that is it. After that it wouldn't load the game. So I am wondering if the title of the game is messing it up. The title does include a "&" symbol and a "-" symbol. Does anyone else have problems with characters in there game titles?

Thanks
InsertCoin25
